trans-unit.source: Enables upgraded Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="WebClass" /> projects to run in ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 讓已升級的 Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="WebClass" /> 專案能在 ASP.NET 中執行。

trans-unit.source: When a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], it is converted to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web site project.
trans-unit.target: 當 Visual Basic 6.0`WebClass`專案升級至[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]，它會轉換成[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]網站專案。

trans-unit.source: Declarations are added to your project: one for the `WebClass` and one for each of the `WebItems` and `Templates` in the `WebClass` project.
trans-unit.target: 宣告會加入至您的專案： 一個用於`WebClass`，另一個用於每個`WebItems`和`Templates`中`WebClass`專案。

trans-unit.source: A `Page_Load` event procedure is added to the project, creating first a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebClass> object and then `WebItem` objects for each of the `WebItems` and `Templates` associated with the Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project.
trans-unit.target: A`Page_Load`事件程序會加入至專案，先建立<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebClass>物件，然後`WebItem`物件的每個`WebItems`和`Templates`聯 Visual Basic 6.0`WebClass`專案。

trans-unit.source: Finally, in the `Page_Load` event procedure, you will see a call to the `WebClass` Compatibility runtime: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebClass.ProcessEvents%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 最後，在`Page_Load`事件程序，您會看到呼叫`WebClass`相容性的執行階段： <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebClass.ProcessEvents%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This enables the runtime to render the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem> specified in the Request URL.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓執行階段呈現<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem>要求 URL 中指定。

trans-unit.source: This code is the only new code added to your upgraded project and only serves to emulate the underlying behavior of the Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` runtime.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼是只有新的程式碼加入至升級的專案，並只是用來模擬基礎行為的 Visual Basic 6.0`WebClass`執行階段。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the <see langword="Name" /> property for the Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="WebClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含 Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="Name" /> 物件的 <see langword="WebClass" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebClass" /> object that contains this <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebClass" /> 物件，包含這個 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: The file name of a Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="Template" /> that was associated with the Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="WebItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="Template" /> 相關聯的 Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="WebItem" /> 的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem> class is used by the upgrade tools to upgrade a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web site project.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem>類別用於升級工具升級 Visual Basic 6.0`WebClass`專案加入[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]網站專案。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name that is used in code to identify a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得程式碼中用來識別 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem" /> 物件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the name for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem" /> 物件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem> class is used by the upgrade tools to upgrade a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web site project.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem>類別用於升級工具升級 Visual Basic 6.0`WebClass`專案加入[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]網站專案。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to rescan for tokens that are contained within replacement text.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值決定是否要重新掃描取代文字中包含的語彙基元 (Token)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the text should be rescanned; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該要重新掃描文字則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem> class is used by the upgrade tools to upgrade a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web site project.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem>類別用於升級工具升級 Visual Basic 6.0`WebClass`專案加入[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]網站專案。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string that is used to prefix replacement tag names in an HTML template.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定字串，這個字串用來做為 HTML 範本中取代標記名稱的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that identifies the <see langword="TagPrefix" /> sequence used to recognize replacement tags in an HTML template.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，識別用來辨認 HTML 範本中取代標記的 <see langword="TagPrefix" /> 序列 (Sequence)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem> class is used by the upgrade tools to upgrade a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web site project.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem>類別用於升級工具升級 Visual Basic 6.0`WebClass`專案加入[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]網站專案。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpResponse" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpResponse" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: The file name of a Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="Template" /> that was associated with the Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="WebItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="Template" /> 相關聯的 Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="WebItem" /> 的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: Processes an HTML template attached to a <see langword="WebItem" /> object and returns it to the browser.
trans-unit.target: 處理附加至 <see langword="WebItem" /> 物件的 HTML 範本，並將它傳回至瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem> class is used by the upgrade tools to upgrade a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web site project.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebItem>類別用於升級工具升級 Visual Basic 6.0`WebClass`專案加入[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]網站專案。
